places_with_reviews.name: Khushi Vatika
address: Pathankot Amritsar, National Highway Road, R56M+2FF, near Bye Pass Chowk, Batala, Punjab 143505, India

reviews.text: Overall a nice well organized venue. Setup and Décor is clean and airy. Especially the washrooms are clean glamorous. Lobby area is beautiful. We attended 3-4 events. Very courteous staff and tables get cleared fast. The food can be improved a notch.

On November 16, 2023, I attended a ceremony function at this venue, a former industrial unit transformed into a spacious resort ( in local language, otherwise it is not resort but a banquet hall).

The location, situated on the main Amritsar Kashmir Road, offers a banquet hall, open space, and parking.

While the venue has potential, it lacks noticeable ambiance, and a significant drawback is its inconspicuousness from the road. Absence of a glow sign makes it challenging for visitors to spot it at first glance, necessitating reliance on Google Maps Directions for navigation.

The single-story banquet hall, devoid of decorations, falls short in comparison to other resorts in Amritsar. However, it accommodates gatherings of around 500 people. Despite these drawbacks, the venue remains a decent choice for organizing functions.

This is one of the best resorts in batala. With the best catering services and the cleanliness in terms of cleaning and hygiene. Also the hospitality of staff and managment is very awesome. You must visit this resort.

It's very good place for marriages...
It's has huge ground air conditioning halland it's own parking
I loved the food and hospitality here... quality was awesome......nice place for reception..... surely recommend it

places_with_reviews.name: Sunny Hotel Restaurant & Beer Bar
address: Near Bus Stand Batala,Jalandhar Road, Shastri Nagar, Batala, Punjab 143505, India

reviews.text: Average hotel with average facilities. But restaurant service and food are really good.

Visited this place for lunch.

Food is fine, service is good.
We opt for a private cabin, a good place for a gathering of 7-8 persons.

We ordered chilli chicken, rahra chicken, butter naan and fried rice.
Surprisingly they are serving Chinese, but not noodles.

Great service and food was exceptional. Room was clean and the staff was also very polite. The cabins in the restaurant area are great for some quality time with family and friends and provide privacy.

This place is great! Had amazing food. The service we received was also amazing. I recommend this place to everyone and definitely I would like to come back here again and again. It's just "THE BEST" in the town.

Stayed here for 10 days for official tour.
Good service with spacious rooms and staff behaviour was very good.
